<!everyone> happy friday!
• first, here's the recording of <@U019F15SA7Q>’s <https://superpath.co/blog/bottom-of-funnel-keyword-research-workshop|bottom of funnel keyword research workshop from earlier this week>.
• second, if you live near NYC, <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C014P2BJLER/p1648058042024279|you can weigh in on our NYC meet up here>. we're gonna reserve space at <https://wearespin.com/location/new-york/|Spin> (a ping pong bar!) and superpath will cover a nice chunk of the bar tab. :smiley::beers::table_tennis_paddle_and_ball:
and here are some great threads from the past few days:
• <@U0380MMNCMA> → <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1648663014165879|Has anyone helped write their company style guide, or done this as a consultant>?
• <@U02333AMCUW> → <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QJ4WKB/p1648586710525379|Are there any Content Marketing Managers who made the switch to Product Marketing Managers>?
• <@U01MM4EAC69> → <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1648686198777479|Which companies are killing it with content right now>?
okay, onto jobs!
